price: 82. Ee ha qoslaan wax yar (adduunka), hana ooyaan wax badan (Aakhiro) abaal marin ahaan waxay kasbadeen (oo denbiyo ah).
arabic: فَلۡيَضۡحَكُواْ قَلِيلٗا وَلۡيَبۡكُواْ كَثِيرٗا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: falyaḍḥakū qalīlan walyabkū kathīran jazāan bimā kānū yaksibūna
